scripts.start: cd services/harmony && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=3096 ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register app/server.ts
scripts.start-dev: cd services/harmony && strict-npm-engines && ts-node-dev --no-notify -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch app/views,public/js --respawn app/server
scripts.start-dev-fast: cd services/harmony && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true ts-node-dev --no-notify -r tsconfig-paths/register --respawn --inspect=127.0.0.1:${DEBUG_PORT:-9200} app/server
scripts.update-dev: pnpm i && pnpm  run -r build && bin/restart-services
scripts.watch-debug: cd services/harmony && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true nodemon --inspect=5858 -e ts,tsx,html --exec node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register app/server.ts
scripts.run-notebooks-image: source .env && docker run -i -t --platform linux/amd64 --init -p 8888:8888 --env NB_EDL_USERNAME="${NB_EDL_USERNAME}" --env NB_EDL_PASSWORD="${NB_EDL_PASSWORD}" harmonyservices/notebooks:${VERSION:-latest}
scripts.publish: pnpm exec --scope=harmony -- VERSION=${VERSION:-latest} pnpm run publish
